data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Ameri, Ali, Talebi, Ali Asghar, Belokobylskij, Sergey A. (2015): Review of the genus Aristelix Nixon, 1943 (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), with description of a new species from Iran and clarification of the status of Antrusachrysogastra (Tobias, 1986). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 45: 97-111, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.45.5313, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.45.5313
